meanings.definition: The quality of being pleasing or delicious to the sense of taste.
meanings.sent1: The tastiness of the cake made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: I love the tastiness of fresh strawberries.
meanings.sent3: The tastiness of the soup was so good, it made the chef do a little dance.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking always adds a touch of tastiness to our gatherings.
meanings.sent5: The tastiness of the chocolate was like a party in my mouth.

meanings.definition: The state of having a pleasant or agreeable flavor.
meanings.sent1: The tastiness of the ice cream was undeniable.
meanings.sent2: The tastiness of the pizza made it disappear in minutes.
meanings.sent3: The tastiness of the lemonade was so refreshing on a hot day.
meanings.sent4: The tastiness of the cookies filled the room with a sweet aroma.
meanings.sent5: The tastiness of the barbecue sauce lingered on my taste buds.
